無現: (むげん) - infinite; incumbent member (or candidate) unaffiliated with a party
無理: (muri) - unreasonable, unnatural, unjustifiable; impossible , unreasonable, unnatural, unjustifiable; impossible; forcible, forced, compulsory; excessive (trabalho, etc.), immoderate
無理がきく: (むりがきく) - to be able to handle strain (overexertion, inconvenience, etc.)
無理が利く: (むりがきく) - to be able to handle strain (overexertion, inconvenience, etc.)
無理が通れば道理が引っ込む: (むりがとおればどうりがひっこむ) - Where might is master, justice is servant
無理はない: (むりはない) - (to be) natural; (to be) understandable
無理もない: (むりもない) - (to be) natural; (to be) understandable
無理も無い: (むりもない) - (to be) natural; (to be) understandable

無理解: (むりかい) - lack of understanding or sympathy

無理非道: (むりひどう) - (yoji) unreasonable and unjust; unconscionable

無生法忍: (むしょうほうにん) - anutpattika-dharma-ksanti (recognition that nothing really arises or perishes)
